typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as integer,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
CasesAndDeathsSource filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterEuropeOnly
FilterEuropeOnly select(mapColumn(
		each(match(ERROR_FUNCTION('')),
			ERROR_FUNCTION('') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectOnlyRequiredFeild
